Reviews.Title: Decent quality
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Kalmes "--Jonathan"
Reviews.Content: Bought a 16-channel Samsung DVR with 10 cameras, then bought one of these to compare camera differences.  Image quality in daylight is slightly better than the Samsung SDC-5340BC cameras that came with the system.  Darkness is where the difference really shows itself...  The Swann's stay in "color" mode under much lower light conditions than the Samsungs.  Also, even when in night mode, they will pick up colors if light is available.  Images in the darkness are much clearer than the Samsungs.  If you're looking for a slight upgrade to stock 600L cameras, this does the job.  Will update review after long term use if needed.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: MYRON
Reviews.Content: Glad I bought this set. The quality is fantastic, has a great picture compared to the other cameras I have up.

ProductInfo.Features:
Clear resolution 700TVL cameras with powerful night vision to 82ft/25m
Sturdy aluminum construction suits indoor & outdoor applications with IP67 rating for any weather conditions
Use the On-Screen Display (OSD) controller that's built-in to the camera cable to customize the camera settings for professional quality video surveillance
Deter thieves, safeguard loved ones, protect your property & fight back against crime
The perfect addition if you already have a recording solution (DVR) and need extra cameras
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWPRO-642PK4-US PRO-642 Multi-Purpose Security Camera (White)
